alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:37AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hand, northeastern Hyde, eastern Faulk and northwestern Spink Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1137 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norbeck to 6 miles west of Orient to near Highmore. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Orient around 1150 AM CDT. Cresbard and Polo around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ree Heights, Devoe, Chelsea, South Scatterwood Lake, Rockham, Miller, St. Lawrence and Burdette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
